data.eml:eml: Review of the Ulopella leafhopper genus group (Auchenorrhyncha, Cicadellidae, Ulopinae) with description of a new genus and species collected from pitfall traps in Zambia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Smith, Lydia R. J., Webb, Michael D. (2016): Review of the Ulopella leafhopper genus group (Auchenorrhyncha, Cicadellidae, Ulopinae) with description of a new genus and species collected from pitfall traps in Zambia. Zootaxa 4189 (3): 571-580, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4189.3.7
